advancements.armoryofdestiny.murasama.de: §4Acquire the Katana of a based Brazilian Samurai§r
advancements.armoryofdestiny.kafkas_kata: §5Acquire the Katana of a deadly elegant Stellaron Hunter§r
advancements.armoryofdestiny.scarlet_oat: §6Acquire the sword of a cunning Scarlet Phoenix. Be careful when you play with fire...§r
advancements.armoryofdestiny.smokenade.d: §0Acquire a grenade of an enigmatic Destiny's Slave.§r
advancements.armoryofdestiny.icicle.desc: §bAcquire a spear of cold incarnate. Please wear gloves.§b
advancements.armoryofdestiny.snowdrop.de: §bAkin a sudden snowdrop our relationship was forged. Only six months, but in such short time we managed to become ever-so-closer, tending to each other's scars and fears. And, I hope we will continue to turn it into something even more beautiful. I love you§o§r
advancements.armoryofdestiny.metallic_fe: §8Fly like a Butterfly, sting like a Bee!§r
§8Acquire a throwing feather. Make sure to count your fingers after holding it.§r
advancements.armoryofdestiny.sharp_irony: §8Acquire a lethally alluring fan. ...Yet still not nearly as alluring as you.§r
advancements.armoryofdestiny.dragonslaye: §0Acquire the Greatsword of the Black Swordsman. It's too large, too heavy, and not even sharp. It's more like a heap of iron.§r
